page.title: 08WHAT I BELIEVE IN.
page.content: On Sundays we go to Holy Trinity Church . At Sunday school we learn about God and Christ. Our religion is called Christianity, our church is called the Church of ENGLAND. We believe in one Holy Body and the Kingdom of God. One way of showing this belief is to pray and to worship God.In the 'Our Father' prayer we say, 'Do not lead us into temptation'. We believe that Jesus was a miracle from from God who was born to help others. People who pass this message on like Popes, vicars, priests, and other true religious believers try to think that Jesus Christ was God's son, and was good to mankind and died for us.This is called the crucifixion, and other tales like this are in the Holy Bible. There are other religions for people that live in different countries that don't believe in God and Christ.
